channel.title: Lilium Longiflorum on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Lilium Longiflorum on funPlantGenes

item.title: LdPMaT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TRINITY_DN1640_c0_g1 Gene Symbol: LdPMaT1 Gene Name: Phenolic glucoside malonyltransferase 1 Genome: Species: Lilium longiflorum Functional Description: ldi-miR396b-LdPMaT1 potentially enhances ROS-scavenging ability, which contributes to improved stress adaptation in autotetraploid lilies.

item.title: LhWRKY44
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LhWRKY44 Gene Name: WRKY transcription factor 44 Genome: Species: Lilium longiflorum Functional Descriptions: Multifaceted roles of LhWRKY44 in promoting anthocyanin accumulation in Asiatic hybrid lilies.

item.title: LlHB16
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LlHB16 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Lilium longiflorum Functional Description: The expression of the core thermal response factors LlHSFA2 and LlMBF1c are involved in the mechanism of establishing the heat resistance of lily.

item.title: LlHOX6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LlHOX6 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Lilium longiflorum Functional Description: Two HD-Zip I transcription factors, LlHOX6 and LlHB16, antagonize the expression of core thermal response factors, LlHSFA2 and LlMBF1c, which are involved in the establishment of heat resistance of lily.

item.title: LlHSFA2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LlHSFA2 Gene Name: HEAT STRESS TRANSCRIPTION FACTOR A2 Genome: Species: Lilium longiflorum Functional Description: The expression of the core thermal response factors LlHSFA2 and LlMBF1c are involved in the mechanism of establishing the heat resistance of lily.

item.title: LlMBF1c
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LlMBF1c Gene Name: MULTIPROTEIN BRIDGING FACTOR 1C Genome: Species: Lilium longiflorum Functional Description: The expression of the core thermal response factors LlHSFA2 and LlMBF1c are involved in the mechanism of establishing the heat resistance of lily.

item.title: LlWRKY39
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LlWRKY39 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Lilium longiflorum Functional Description: the promoter of LlMBF1c was isolated from lily, and LlWRKY39 was found to bind to the conserved W-box element in its promoter to activate its activity, suggesting that LlWRKY39 is an upstream regulator of LlMBF1c.
